item.title: Huge Pothole Previously reported - NOTHING Done!, 26th June
item.description:
The location is Westdown Carpark in the AONB - a well used area for access to Cleeve Common. This Pothole has gotten larger and deeper and vehicles are likely to be damaged sooner or later. Please can it be filled in as soon as possible - there is even some hardcore flytipped in the area that could be used!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Sevenhampton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Intrusive street lighting into garden and living room, 25th June
item.description:
Intrusive street lighting into garden and living room. There are two street lights service in a car park area behind the house is a Cottonwood Grove. They seem to be very bright and on until the early hours shining through our windows at night. Is it possible to have some Downlighting on them so theyâ€™re not so bright into the gardens?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 3 Cottonwood Grove, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees and hedges overgrown, 25th June
item.description:
